str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!
From pro and histemi; to stand before, i.e. to preside, or to practise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To take care of, attend to. Middle voice from epi and the same as melo; to care for.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
